snippet: Hennessy is combining a traditional campaign in Vanity Fair with so-called native advertising, ads made to look like the magazine’s editorial content.
abstract: Advertising column examines new effort from Hennessy that combines a traditional campaign in Vanity Fair with so-called native advertising, ads made to look like the magazine's editorial content.
lead_paragraph: Hennessy is combining a traditional campaign in Vanity Fair with so-called native advertising, ads made to look like the magazine’s editorial content.

headline.main: A Message That Tries to Blend In
